Package com.frankly.franklysdk.app

Provides the UI-related components, including the activities and fragments.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageInputFragment.OnMessageSentListener
    Called when a message is sent, successfully or not.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMessageFragment
    Contains the logic that is common between all fragments that make up a room's message list and input field.
    BaseRoomListActivity
    Contains the logic that is common between all room list activities.
    ConditionalRoomListActivity
    Shows the list of conditional rooms available for the current user, some of which may be locked behind a condition.
    MessageInputFragment
    Handles the message input field and all of its related logic.
    MessageListFragment
    Handles the listing of messages and all related logic.
    RoomActivity
    Shows the message list for a room as well as the input field to send new messages (if the current user has the privilege to send messages).
    RoomListActivity
    Shows the list of rooms available for the current user to join.

Package com.frankly.franklysdk.app Description

Provides the UI-related components, including the activities and fragments.
